tool_description: Tests for bacterial pathogens and indicator organisms using field-compatible culture methods, membrane filtration, and rapid detection techniques.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

test_type.description: Testing method: membrane_filtration, culture_plates, dipslides, or rapid_test_strips

target_organisms.description: Bacterial organisms or indicators to test for

sample_volume_ml.description: Volume of sample used for testing in milliliters

error_messages: Invalid test type: Must be one of [membrane_filtration, culture_plates, dipslides, rapid_test_strips]
Unsupported target organism: One or more organisms not compatible with selected test method
Insufficient sample volume: Not enough sample for requested number of tests and dilutions
Temperature out of range: Incubation temperature must be between 20°C and 45°C
Incubation time invalid: Time must be between 4 and 72 hours depending on test type
Sterility compromised: Sample or equipment contamination detected
Media expired: Growth medium has exceeded shelf life
Cross-contamination risk: Dilution series setup may cause cross-contamination
usage: Specify sample ID, test type, and target organisms. Set appropriate incubation conditions based on organisms being tested. Maintain sterile technique throughout process.

total_bacterial_count.description: Total bacterial count per 100mL of sample

pathogen_presence.description: List of pathogens detected in sample

safety_classification.description: Water safety classification based on bacterial levels

treatment_urgency.description: Urgency level for treatment based on pathogen load
